GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of this class.

GetTextPr.name: GetTextPr
GetTextPr.description: Specify the text properties which will be applied to the text in the current numbering level itself, not to the text in the subsequent paragraph.<note>To change the text style for the paragraph, a style must be applied to it using the ApiRun.SetStyle method.</note>

GetParaPr.name: GetParaPr
GetParaPr.description: The paragraph properties which are applied to any numbered paragraph that references the given numbering definition and numbering level.

SetTemplateType.name: SetTemplateType
SetTemplateType.description: Set one of the existing predefined numbering templates.

params.name: sType
params.description: Set one of the existing predefined numbering templates.

params.name: sSymbol
params.description: The symbol used for the list numbering. This parameter have a meaning only if the sType="bullet" property is selected.

SetCustomType.name: SetCustomType
SetCustomType.description: Set your own customized numbering type.

params.name: sType
params.description: The custom numbering type used for the current numbering definition.

params.name: sTextFormatString
params.description: Any text in this parameter will be taken as literal text to be repeated in each instance of this numbering level, except for any use of the percent symbol (%) followed by a number, which will be used to indicate the one-based index of the number to be used at this level. Any number of a level higher than this level will be ignored.higher than this level shall be ignored.

params.name: sAlign
params.description: Type of justification applied to the text run in the current numbering level.

SetRestart.name: SetRestart
SetRestart.description: Specify a one-based index which determines when a numbering level should restart to its starting value. A numbering level restarts when an instance of the specified numbering level, which will be higher (earlier than the this level) is used in the given document contents. By default this value is true.

params.name: isRestart
params.description: The true value will enable the SetRestart method use.

SetStart.name: SetStart
SetStart.description: Specify the starting value for the numbering used by the parent numbering level within a given numbering level definition. By default this value is 1.

SetSuff.name: SetSuff
SetSuff.description: Specify the content which will be added between a given numbering level text and the text of every numbered paragraph which references that numbering level. By default this value is "tab".

params.name: sType
params.description: The content added between the numbering level text and the text in the numbered paragraph.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a reference to a specified level of the numbering.
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class representing a reference to a specified level of the numbering.
